page.title: 18CAMBORNE SCHOOL
page.content: Camborne School is a well established Comprehensive which serves Camborne and all the outlying districts including the whole of our survey area.There are about 1400 pupils in the school which is situated in the Treswithian area in the estates. The majority of the children from our school go on to attend Camborne School.The school has a sixth form attached to it and offers a full range of academic subjects at all levels.The school has a large playing area and a well equipped Sports Hall.
